title: Contadina Quick Bolognese Sauce
directions: Brown beef, bacon, onion, celery and carrots in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until browned and crisp, about 10 minutes.
Add broth; simmer until evaporated, scraping browned bits from bottom of pan.
Stir in tomatoes and milk. Simmer over medium-low heat until sauce is thickened, about 15 minutes.  Serve over pasta.
ingredients: 1/2 cup COLLEGE INN Fat Free & Lower Sodium Beef Broth, or red or white wine
